channel.title: Server + Website +DataBase?
channel.description: hey guys...i was wondering if it was possible to hookup registrations off a website page....and have a database for characters ect..in mysql??? or navicat??? is it possible to do?? because if you have a database you can have ur database connected with ur site..which gives you acess to put rankings ect...soo is this possible?? ive seen a few servers like this..and was wondering how to do this.

item.title: Server + Website +DataBase?
item.dc:creator: @Spotlight Spotlight
item.description:
@Spotlight wrote:

It’s possible, just hardcore coding and difficult to do.

Read full topic
